title: Firefox for Android 54.0a2 Aurora

notes.note: Fixed formatting for right-to-left languages, including formatting of preference names in about:config
File names correctly preserved on upload

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.0
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
